abstract: I’m trying to decide between a Palm Pre and an Apple iPhone 3GS. I now use an antiquated Treo 650. Will all my contacts, calendar info and memos in the Treo transfer to either phone?
snippet: I’m trying to decide between a Palm Pre and an Apple iPhone 3GS. I now use an antiquated Treo 650. Will all my contacts, calendar info and memos in the Treo transfer to either phone?
lead_paragraph: Q. I’m trying to decide between a Palm Pre and an Apple iPhone 3GS. I now use an antiquated Treo 650, which contains all of my life. Will all my contacts, calendar info and memos in the Treo transfer to either phone?
